channel.title: math.AC updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.AC updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Homological dimensions of complexes over coherent regular rings
item.description: arXiv:2409.08393v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We show that Iacob-Iyengar's answer to a question of Avromov-Foxby extends from Noetherian to coherent rings. In particular, a coherent ring R is regular if and only if the injective (resp. projective) dimension of each complex X of R-modules agrees with its graded-injective (resp. graded-projective) dimension. The same is shown for the analogous dimensions based on FP-injective R-modules, and on flat R-modules.
item.dc:creator: James Gillespie, Alina Iacob

item.title: Derived characterizations for rational pairs \`{a} la Schwede-Takagi and Koll\'{a}r-Kov\'{a}cs
item.description: arXiv:2501.02783v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: Our work establishes derived characterizations for notions of rational pairs \`{a} la Schwede--Takagi and Koll\'{a}r--Kov\'{a}cs. We use a concept of generation in triangulated categories, introduced by Bondal and Van den Bergh, to study these classes of singularities for pairs. One component of our work introduces rational pairs \`{a} la Koll\'{a}r--Kov\'{a}cs for quasi-excellent schemes of characteristic zero, which gives a Kov\'{a}cs style splitting criterion and a Kov\'{a}cs-Schwede style cohomological vanishing result.
item.dc:creator: Pat Lank, Peter McDonald, Sridhar Venkatesh
